import { useContext } from 'react' import classes from './Cart.module.css' import Modal from '../UI/Modal' import CartContext from '../store/cart-context' import CartItem from './CartItem' const Cart = (props) => { const cartCtx = useContext(CartContext) const cartItems = cartCtx.items.map((item) => ( )) const totalAmount = `$${cartCtx.totalAmount.toFixed(2)}` const hasItems = cartCtx.items.length > 0 return (
    {cartItems}
Total Amount {totalAmount}
{hasItems && }
) } export default Cart
